answers.answer: Hi, thanks for your query.Your history is quite inadequate to give an opinion.May I know your age, gender and current weight? Do you suffer from a medical illness such as diabetes, hypertension or any other medical illness?Please check your vitals and also a thyroid function test.  A physician can guide you with these tests. It looks like you need medical attention.Wish you good health

question: all my body sweats alot even when im sat down andi always feel hot and clammy i just genually feel unwell, ive also been getting chest pain for quite a while now but just shrugged it off but the other day my chest pain seemed to be a lot worse than previously and it scared me, i wondered if you could possibly have any idea what could be the matter with me.
title: its getting me down
